overview: SST offers a distinctive 4-year programme leading to the GCE O-Level examination. The curriculum integrates applied learning with mainstream subjects, providing students with a unique educational experience that emphasises real-world application of knowledge.

appliedSubjects.name: Computing+
appliedSubjects.description: Students learn computational thinking, programming, and app development. The curriculum covers Python, Swift, and web development, equipping students with 21st-century digital skills.

appliedSubjects.name: Biotechnology
appliedSubjects.description: Students explore the fascinating world of biological sciences and its technological applications. Hands-on laboratory experiences bring textbook concepts to life.

appliedSubjects.name: Design Studies
appliedSubjects.description: Students develop creative thinking and design skills through human-centred design processes. They learn to identify problems and create innovative solutions.

appliedSubjects.name: Electronics
appliedSubjects.description: Students gain hands-on experience with electronic circuits, microcontrollers, and embedded systems. They learn to design and build electronic solutions for real-world problems.

enrichmentProgrammes.name: Innovation Programme (IvP)
enrichmentProgrammes.description: A platform for students to identify real-world problems and develop innovative solutions through the design thinking process.

enrichmentProgrammes.name: Student-Initiated Learning (SIL)
enrichmentProgrammes.description: Dedicated time for students to pursue their passions and interests in self-directed learning projects.

enrichmentProgrammes.name: STEM Research Programme
enrichmentProgrammes.description: Opportunities for students to engage in authentic research projects mentored by university researchers and industry professionals.

enrichmentProgrammes.name: Overseas Learning Trips
enrichmentProgrammes.description: Immersive learning experiences abroad to broaden students' perspectives and develop global awareness.
